phrases: It appeared as though humanity would be destroyed by the demons.
But a single mage saved them all.
He was called the Wizard King, and he became a legend.
Working together with his friends, Asta continued his battle with Vetto.
Vetto was able to overcome those attacks, too.
If even one of you makes the smallest mistake, you will die instantly!
Asta continued to swing his sword,
believing in his friends and in their victory.
Guess we got here in time.
We do not have time for that!
We are being led far away
Until we shatter the road between light and darkness
I am falling down because of a twist of fate
The harmony we had is in the past
The scent of you is stuck in my head
Waiting just is not enough anymore, Yai yah!
Until we seize the hope in front of us
Did you think your puny strengths combined would actually work against me?
I let you hit me on purpose, in a non-vital spot, so I could steal your weapon!
I know that once you lose all hope, the most unmistakable despair is created!
Fall into the darkness of despair!
That is the way I wanted to hear you humans scream!
How do you like that, insect?!
I would like to see you try to stand again now!
How did you like that, you despair freak?!
That is the last of our magic!
He was born without magic into this world where magic is everything.
Perhaps the gods of fate did not give him magic because he is like this.
He is someone who is going to make it to the top in this world.
We need to let him fight and guide him!
Little boy, I will support your broken arm!
We are doing this again, Finral!
I am going to do this!
No matter how many times it takes!
I still have one sword left!
I do not have time for that!
There is someone I cannot lose to!
You and despair... are in the way of our promise!
You insects can be swatted away!
I have already seen through your movements
My eyes cannot keep up with his movements.
Because the Demon-Dweller Sword is still embedded in me,
the magic I was using to increase my physical abilities has weakened!
I thought that I had stolen his weapon.
But are you saying it was my weapon that was actually stolen?!
There is no way that I would lose... against you humans!
You have not won against anyone!
Did any of them actually give up before you?
This time I will end you for good
I am not giving up yet!
He is the same as me... No...
The three leaves of the clover represent faith, hope, and love.
Within a fourth leaf dwells good luck.
He is... a demon who devours even despair.
Grey words cannot make anything happen
Wishing to fly freely across the sky
I dreamed it all my life
Step by step I go, though it is a doubtful world
Do not care how much I fall
Instinct is my guide, I never give up
To faraway future, I burst out running
Go beyond even the unseen fears
The vision I had, so I can be myself
Someday I will write the next page
I was able to meet you
Th-There is no question this time!
How do you like that, you bastard?!
I am so proud of you!
I knew you could win, little boy!
Thank goodness you did not despair!
That shrimp is full of guts.
I am injured all over, remember?!
What was the power that came from the kid earlier?
I thought we were done for!
Miss Vanessa, how are their wounds?
They are deep, but none of them are life-threatening.
Finral, do you think you can transport them with your spatial magic?
I think it will take a little longer for my magic to recover.
You are so useless, you coward.
I hope Kiato and Kahono will be able to dance and sing again.
Do you really have time to worry about other people?
Look at how beat up you are.
And to think you actually believed in us.
There is something seriously wrong with you, Asta.
You never know when that coward Finral will run away.
Though it is true that I did want to run away.
But when I saw Asta, my body moved on its own.
Little boy, because you did not give up...
Because you believed in us, we were able to win.
You are my seniors, who Captain Yami accepted into the Black Bulls.
Of course I believe in you!
You sure know how to make a girl smile.
You have got some great seniors, la.
I would expect nothing less from the juniors that Captain Yami accepted.
Well, I am pretty sure he is the only one who would ever accept
Hey, I am one of your juniors too, you know.
I heard you did great, too!
You learned some insane new attack spell, right?
You would better compliment me more!
And she is cute to boot!
That has nothing to do with the battle, but keep the compliments coming!
D-D-Do not get any weird ideas!
Let us have a drink to celebrate our victory!
Now's not the time to drink!
We need to figure out a way to tie up that guy and haul him outta here.
He has an eyeball in his forehead and said something about my sword...
But most of all, he is one of the leaders of the Eye of the Midnight Sun!
There is a lot we have to ask him!
Those damn humans... hurting this tiny little bird...
Let us go home and tend to its wounds.
I am sorry that you always have to save me, Licht.
We are friends, are not we?
We are just like this bird.
Because it can fly, like we can use special magic,
they envy and want to hurt us.
But I believe that one day, we and the humans will be able to understand each other.
I am sure if you say so, it will come true.
It is a very sweet notion.
To me, Licht was... yes, he was hope personified.
But the ones who stole that hope away from me...
I am taking you all down with me...
I will blow this whole temple to smithereens!
Even they will not be able to stop that.
Let me the hell out of here!
It is the same as last time!
Even the captains could barely stop it!
It is the same as him...
Do not tell me he is planning to self-destruct!
I cannot get any closer like this!
Guys, we are not going to be doing anything different!
We will just kick his ass again!
No, no, no, that is not
What the heck am I saying?
I am not giving up until the end!
If you figure this out, I will go on a date with you.
There must be something we can still do!
I will not forgive anyone who gets in the way of my seeing Marie!
I am going to defeat him and eat seafood I have not even discovered yet!
I am scared, but I will do my best!
B-But I thought you were trapped...
As you can see, I broke through the spatial magic and got out.
Though I might have been a bit forceful about it.
Could not you have done that a bit sooner?
If I am not wanted here, I can go home, you know.
All because I wanted to play this stupid game...
I am sorry to drag you into this old fool's mess, too.
B-But to think this man could use magic like that...
I was right not to let him participate in the game.
Looks like we do not have much time, so let us get this over with.
we have basically got a whole cavalry... no, a whole army!
Let us beat the snot outta that guy!
Who do you think you are talking to?
Did your head swell because you thought you took the enemy down?
I am saying that I can take him on my own.
You guys risked your lives fighting him.
I am the captain, so I have got to go all-out.
I will be nice and take care of the cleanup.
Or rather, I am taking all the glory.
The reason I was able to surpass my limits...
is because of all of you, you dumbasses!
Getting trapped and pushed against a wall was worth it.
This spell reminds me a bit of a certain stretched-out weirdo,
and that bothers me, but still...
You humans shall taste despair... Despair!
Shut up with the despair this, despair that already, you three-eyed goon!
It does not matter how strong your magic is!
Dark Magic: Dark Cloaked Dimension Slash!
Consider that my thanks for looking after my squad.
On such a bad day, whispering Bye Bye Black Birds
Will not make my anxiety go away
I have been crying for hours Baby
All those letters that you gave to me
Every time I read them again, the pain's gone
We are not alone, because we are perfect as four
Even though we are far apart, we are connected, believing you
I always feel you next to me
closer to me and a clover for you
I wish you the best of luck
You know you are not alone, because we are perfect as four
Even though we are far apart, we are connected, you live in me
I will always be by your side
closer to me and a clover for you
I wish you the best of luck
The Professional The Way of the Toilet
The Professional The Way of the Toilet
As the captain who leads the rest of the Black Bulls,
he does most of his thinking on the toilet.
Our investigative team asked him one question.
It is because the toilet is there.
But let me just say one thing.
Before going in, you need to make sure there is toilet paper.
Those who enter a bathroom without toilet paper
are like birds who have had their wings torn off.
They will never be able to fly out to the blue sky
that lies beyond the bathroom ever again.
By the way, the one in charge of the toilet paper here is the brat, but he always forgets.
I have seen hell many times because of him, but I showed him an even worse hell.
After that, his remarks about the toilet continued for hours.
But there was one thing we wanted to ask him before we finished this interview.
How long are you going to stay on the toilet...?
How long are you going to stay in there?!
I cannot come out because you did not restock the toilet paper!
Let me out of here, damn it!
I cannot just fool around after you guys worked so hard.
Black Clover, Page 50: End of the Battle, End of Despair.
Page 50 End of the Battle, End of Despair
That is important, so I said it twice!
